page.title: 04RELIGION IN BRYNNAU
page.content: The most popular religion in Brynna is Church of England.Out of 100 people which we questioned 34 were Church of England,also 4 people had no religon at all.There are 3 churches in our area.They are the{Methodist}which is in William St.{,St Peters is in {Church St.}and the{Zoar}which is in {Rhiwceiliog.}Their religions are {Methodist, Church of England}and {Methodist. There are also the remains of the{Old St. Peters Church}up on the mountains{Map Ref 9933 8532}.The font and bell have been brought down from the{Old St Peters Church}and are regularly used in the{New St {Peters Church. By HELEN TUDOR {+ {KATHRYN GREEN
